channel.title: Adding Emote
channel.description: Ok guys ive added a completionist cape and i want to know how to add a emote for it. Can someone please help me?

item.title: Adding Emote
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

You need to download the animation and then add it to your animations folder then write something like this:
setAnimation(AnimID);
I do not really understand it but I think you should do something similar
Good Luck-
And Team_Rocket I’m not looking for a fight too.

Read full topic

#2 im saying i want the dragon emote that it has in real rs in my server.[/quote]

  2. I’m not fighting at all, I’m not the least bit angry.

item.title: Adding Emote
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RSPS222:

Lol bro hahaha i can know if you copied or not but hahaha i just said what you wrote thats what i wrote (No offense bro.)

Your English is broken. I’m not sure I understand what you’re trying to say.

umm i think you need to download the emote and then after added the downloaded file in your comp cape skill emote clicked add something like this: setEmote(EmoteId you downloaded ithink); something like this

You’re telling them to download a file (modern Emote), and the rest is poorly written, so I can barely understand what you’re trying to communicate.

umm i think

You shouldn’t be helping people if you yourself don’t know, lol.

So you’re trying to say that I copied what you’ve said? You must be new here? I don’t believe we’ve said the same thing. Perhaps you should try using Google Translator in your native tongue and have it convert to English.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Emote
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Find the I.D. of the Skillcape Emote Button. Add a condition stating if they’re wearing the Cape I.D. in the correct Equipment Slot to perform the Emote you want once the Skillcape Emote Button is clicked.

Or are you asking how to get the modern Emote into your Client?

Read full topic

umm i think you need to download the emote and then after added the downloaded file in your comp cape skill emote clicked add something like this:
setEmote(EmoteId you downloaded ithink);
something like this

item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Add to the list of skillcapes and give it an emote, then it should be usable for the skillcape emote.
